description: ESA SPACE-SHIELD Techniques adapted for SCOR. This galaxy uses a matrix format similar to MITRE ATT&CK to allow selection of multiple techniques and sub-techniques across tactics. Matrix_layout_hint: tactics-columns | techniques-rows. Namespace_display: SCOR. Namespace_long: Space, Cybersecurity, Operations, and Resilience. Notes: This file defines the matrix galaxy descriptor only. The corresponding cluster file will define the actual techniques and sub-techniques.. Source_url: https://spaceshield.esa.int/.
